name: Morbid Expedition
description:
Every 10 seconds they spawn !! 

Team up with 3 friends on steam ! Kill, run and survive as long as you can to earn the best score !

Open Steam before the game to create a party !

And don't forget to post your score screenshots in comments ! 📩

Controls : 

Movements: ZDSQ or WASD Shift for Sprint 

Teams : 

Felix Coeugniet - https://www.artstation.com/swissknifev1

Level Art - Chara Art  - Sound

Nicolas decouture - https://nicolasdecouture.myportfolio.com/

VFX - UI

Tom Le Corvic - https://www.artstation.com/tomlecorvic

Tech ART - VFX

 Elie Bouillard - https://eliebouillard.com/

Programming
